 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺצה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==plumage== (compare possibly Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hair over forehead, fore-lock*** of horse, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>3033</sup>; see also Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***na-aƒ kappe***</u></abbr>); — of eagle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵא הַגּ‎</span> [[Ezek.17.3|Ezek 17:3]] (figurative of Nebuch.; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּנָף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵבֶר‎</span>); also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַב נ‎</span> v[[Ezek.17.7|Ezek 17:7]] (figurative of king of Egypt; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּנָף‎</span>); of ostrich <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצָה‎</span> [[Job.39.13|Job 39:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כנף‎</span>, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶבְרָה‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]). Here belongs probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֹצָתָהּ‎</span> [[Lev.1.16|Lev 1:16]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֹצָתֹה‎</span> ([[BDB#Dr-Wh|Dr-Wh]]<sup>Hpt</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בנצתו‎</span> ([[BDB#Sam|⅏]]), or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְ(אֶתֿ) נֹצָתוֺ‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]), ***its feathers***, of bird for burnt-offering; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">σὺν τοῖς πτεροῖς</span>, [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***et plumas***; so [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RVm]]; &gt; with ***its filth*** (i.e. of the crop) <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**Onk**</sup></lookup> [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Kn|Kn]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] Kal [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#RV|RV]], meaning without evidence elsewhere.
